client

Interface ClientListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WhiteboardGUI

    public interface ClientListener
    This listener should be added to a ClientApplication. All messages received from a ClientApplication delegates the action of treating what's going to happen in the GUI by calling the callbacks in this listener.
    Author:
    Nicholas M. Mizoguchi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChangeboardMessageReceived(CWPMessage message)
      Receives a message that a user is switching whiteboards Calls RunnableChangeboard
      void onChatMessageReceived(CWPMessage message)
      Receives a chat message from a user and calls RunnableChat to update the chatbox
      void onDisconnecteduserMessageReceived(CWPMessage message)
      Receives a message of the announcement of a user that disconnected.
      void onInvalidMessageReceived(java.lang.String invalidMessage)
      Callback called when the server attempts to send an invalid message.
      void onNewuserMessageReceived(CWPMessage message)
      Receives a message of the announcement of a new user Calls RunnableNewuser and RunnableChat to update the chatbox and userlist
      void onPaintMessageReceived(CWPMessage message)
      Receives a message that the user is painting on the canvas and calls CanvasPainter to paint
      void onReceiveUpdatedUsersOnBoard(CWPMessage message)
      Receives a message that contains all online users in the same board as this client.
      void onWhiteboardsMessageReceived(CWPMessage message)
      Receives a message that a new whiteboard was created and updates the list of existing whiteboards

    • Method Detail

      • onNewuserMessageReceived

        void onNewuserMessageReceived(CWPMessage message)
        Receives a message of the announcement of a new user Calls RunnableNewuser and RunnableChat to update the chatbox and userlist
        Parameters:
        message - CWPMessage object that represents the message received from the server.

      • onDisconnecteduserMessageReceived

        void onDisconnecteduserMessageReceived(CWPMessage message)
        Receives a message of the announcement of a user that disconnected. Calls RunnableDisconnecteduser and RunnableChat to update the chatbox and userlist
        Parameters:
        message - CWPMessage object that represents the message received from the server.

      • onWhiteboardsMessageReceived

        void onWhiteboardsMessageReceived(CWPMessage message)
        Receives a message that a new whiteboard was created and updates the list of existing whiteboards
        Parameters:
        message - CWPMessage object that represents the message received from the server.

        Receives a message that contains all online users in the same board as this client.
        Parameters:

      • onInvalidMessageReceived

        void onInvalidMessageReceived(java.lang.String invalidMessage)
        Callback called when the server attempts to send an invalid message.
        Parameters:
        invalidMessage - The String sent from the server, which is invalid.
